CustomField.description: Used for details around if a team has not completed their testing of the Core Release against the Hybrid Applications that are in development and slated for the S1 Major Release. Only needed if "No" is selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide details if "No" is selected for the "Core Release against Hybrid Apps in Dev" field.
CustomField.label: Provide Details for Core/In-dev Hybrid
